rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, Tora! What's up? You look a little
bit spaced out, looking at the view like
that.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0002
rows.name: Hm? Boss?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0003
rows.name:
I was thinking about Dadapon
being captured here.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0004
rows.name:
I see,
this is where he was forced
to produce artificial Blades.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0005
rows.name:
Dadapon was always a coward
and too gentle to do anything bad.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0006
rows.name: But they made him...

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0007
rows.name: Tora...?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0008
rows.name:
Being forced to create such ugly,
uninspired Blades. It must have been
so painful for him!

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0009
rows.name:
Huh?
Hang on a moment, Tora.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0010
rows.name: What is it, Boss?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0011
rows.name:
I thought you were sad because
your father was captured?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0012
rows.name: That's not it.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0013
rows.name:
I think Dadapon actually enjoyed
working on the Blades.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0014
rows.name: Really...?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0015
rows.name: Yes!

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0016
rows.name:
As proof, both Kiku and Sakura
completely reflect my dad's tastes!

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0017
rows.name: Yeah, I can't deny that...

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0018
rows.name:
But those artificial Blades he was
forced to make for Bahn... They have no
spark of manly ambition at all!

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0020
rows.name: Something wrong, Boss?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0021
rows.name:
No, I'm just realizing how...
intense your family's passions are...

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0022
rows.name:
Well of course!
Our family dedicates our lives
to pursuing our manly dreams!

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0023
rows.name: Let me ask Tora about something.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0024
rows.name: What kind of person was Dr. Senzo?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0025
rows.name: What kind of person was Dr. Tatezo?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0101
rows.name: Senzo? My Grampypon?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0102
rows.name: Hana is curious too. Please tell us.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0103
rows.name: I don't remember much about Grampypon.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0104
rows.name: Is that so?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0105
rows.name:
He was totally dedicated to his work,
always locked away in his laboratory...

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0106
rows.name: He spent all his time on experiments?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0107
rows.name:
No, he was always reading
naughty books.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0109
rows.name:
Grampypon was especially obsessed
with researching physical appearance
and mannerisms.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0110
rows.name:
And not mature women either.
He was fixated on creating innocent,
youthful maidens!

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0111
rows.name:
Huh? That's what he was
particular about!?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0112
rows.name:
That sounds extremely illegal.
I'm disgusted.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0113
rows.name:
M-meh?! When Hana says that,
it hits too close to home...

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0114
rows.name:
Anyway, he continued to obsess
over maiden-like forms and behavior.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0115
rows.name:
To achieve that,
he finally completed the ether furnace!

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0116
rows.name:
Furthermore, he was particular
about self-destruct functions
and secret equipment...

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0117
rows.name:
Secretly snickering
while facing his blueprints.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0118
rows.name:
Even as a young Tora,
I felt the spirit of
a mad scientist.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0119
rows.name:
I see, so that great invention was
the crystallization of his desire.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0120
rows.name:
Your family really is
something else, Tora...

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0121
rows.name:
The current Hana seems to
embody that too.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0122
rows.name:
Hana is having some very mixed
feelings about this...

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0201
rows.name: About my dad Tatezo?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0202
rows.name:
Hana wants to know about him too!
Please tell us!

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0203
rows.name:
Dadapon Tatezo was pretty shy
and had trouble communicating
with others.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0204
rows.name:
Was that why he buried
himself in his research?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0205
rows.name:
Yes, he apparently spent
all day just doing research.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0206
rows.name:
So apparently even at
the graduation party, he was alone.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0207
rows.name:
But that turned out to be lucky,
because it made Mamapon ask him to dance!

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0208
rows.name:
She said she couldn't leave him
alone because he was such
a hopeless person.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0209
rows.name: Huh, I see.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0210
rows.name: So, where is your mother now?

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0211
rows.name:
In the end, she left saying
my dad was a hopeless person.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0212
rows.name:
So the reason for meeting
and parting was the same.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0213
rows.name:
Dadapon was completely absorbed
in working with Grampypon to create
artificial Blades like Kiku and Hana.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0214
rows.name:
Mamapon got tired of all that,
I think.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0215
rows.name:
...That's completely understandable.
Even Hana feels that way sometimes.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0216
rows.name:
But it was necessary to pursue our
ambitions and make our dreams reality!!

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0217
rows.name:
That's what Dadapon always says,
but be careful not to bring it up.
It makes him really depressed.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0218
rows.name:
It takes him three whole days
of binge eating and drinking
to recover.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0219
rows.name:
It sounds troublesome,
so I'll be very careful.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0220
rows.name:
He sacrificed various things
to make great inventions.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0221
rows.name:
But it's pretty amazing to think
that because of all that,
we got to meet Hana.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0222
rows.name:
I have mixed feelings about all this,
but I'm grateful to you, Masterpon.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0223
rows.name:
Ahem!
You should respect me more and more!

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0224
rows.name: I don't really want to do that.

rows.label: kizunatalk028_msg0225
rows.name: Why?!
